summary: Successfully verified D3 simulation auto-stop functionality. CRITICAL PASS: Simulation stops after exactly 300 ticks with proper console message. Node stability confirmed through multiple test scenarios.
passed_tests: ✅ CRITICAL: Simulation auto-stop after 300 ticks - Console message 'Simulation stopped after initial layout (300 ticks)' appears consistently
✅ CRITICAL: D3 graph interface loads properly with graph container
✅ CRITICAL: Nodes render correctly and are visible in the interface
✅ CRITICAL: Visual stability confirmed - nodes stay in fixed positions after simulation stops
✅ Mind mapping interface navigation works correctly
✅ Node creation and rendering functionality works
✅ Physics toggle button is present and functional
✅ Realign button is present and accessible
✅ Auto-save functionality works during node operations
